mapper.select: select A.PUT_SHOW_NO AS putShowNo, A.ACTOR_NO AS actorNo, B.ACTOR_NAME AS actorName from show_actors A, actors B where a.actor_no = b.actor_no and a.put_show_no=#{showNo}
select seat_grade as grade, seat_price as price from show_place_seat group by seat_grade, seat_price
select CATEGORY_NO AS no, CATEGORY_NAME AS name, TOP_CATEGORY_NO AS topCategoryNo from SHOW_CATEGORIES WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{catno}
select CATEGORY_NO AS no, CATEGORY_NAME AS name, TOP_CATEGORY_NO AS topCategoryNo from SHOW_CATEGORIES WHERE TOP_CATEGORY_NO = #{catno}
select PLACE_NO AS no, LOCAL_NAME AS localName, PLACE_NAME AS name, PLACE_ADDRESS AS address, SEAT_CAPACITY AS seatCapacity FROM SHOW_PLACE WHERE PLACE_NO = #{palceno}
